yesOrMembership.1: Signing up is easy, you can head on over to the CELA online platform at 'URL'. Keep the name of your local library and your library or SQLA number handy, that's all you'll need. You can also ask for help at your local library. As soon as your membership is activated, you can come back to  start using the {{- name}} library via Alexa, by saying 'Hey Google, launch {{- name}}'
